Title: Private Vices, Public Pleasures
Writer: Miklós Jancsó (story), Giovanna Gagliardo (story), Giovanna Gagliardo (screenplay)
Actors: Lajos Balázsovits, Pamela Villoresi, Franco Branciaroli, Teresa Ann Savoy
Plot: Rudolf is a good-natured pan-sexual golden boy, who cavorts on his rural estate with a host of beautiful, aristocratic lovers and friends of both sexes. He refuses to leave his country idyll even though he has been ordered to by the Emperor, his father.
